member.summary: This event will be fired whenever the is opening in the view. Occurring of this event can be cancelled based on conditions.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.Closing
member.summary: This event will be fired whenever the is closing in the view. Occurring of this event can be cancelled based on conditions.

member.summary: Displays the Popup at the touch point.

member.summary: Displays the popup at the given x and y point.
member.param: The root view of the Activity, if the root view is not SfPopupLayout.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.ShowRelativeToView(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.RelativePosition,Windows.UI.Xaml.FrameworkElement)
member.param: X-position of the relative view in SfPopupLayout
Y-position of the relative view in SfPopupLayout
Width of the relative view.
Height of the relative view

member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.DismissPopup(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dismisses the pop-up from the view.
member.param: Indicates whether to reset the ParentView in the ContentView
member.remarks: This parameter is used, when the rootView is not SfPopupLayout. If it is true, the ParentView will be reset in the CotentView, else the rootView will be maintained as SfPopupLayout.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.CanLayoutForGivenSizeAndPosition
member.summary: Returns whether the layout of the popup view is made for the given size and position.
member.returns: Returns whether the layout of the popup view is made for the given size and position.
member.remarks: If the layout is made for the given size and position, PopupView will not be layout for the full view of the application. Hence in this case, the calculations must be made for the Container of the SfPopupLayout instead of the PopupView. In order to check whether the calculations must be made either to the PopupView or Container, this case is checked.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.ClosePopupIfRequired
member.summary: Closes the popup, when touch is made outside the popup view, provided StaysOpen is false.
member.returns: Returns whether to hold the touch in SfPopupLayout. Returns true, in order not to pass touch to the child views and hold touch in SfPopupLayout itself.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AnimationMode
member.summary: Built-in animations available in SfPopupLayout, which is applied when the PopupView opens and closes in the screen.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.Zoom
member.summary: zoom-out animation will be applied when the PopupView opens and zoom-in animation will be applied when the PopupView closes

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.Fade
member.summary: Fade-out animation will be applied when the PopupView opens and Fade-in animation will be applied when the PopupView closes

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.SlideOnLeft
member.summary: PopupView will be animated from left-to-right, when it opens and it will be animated from right-to-left when the PopupView closes.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.SlideOnTop
member.summary: PopupView will be animated from top-to-bottom, when it opens and it will be animated from bottom-to-top when the PopupView closes.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.None
member.summary: Animation will not be applied.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AppearanceMode
member.summary: Built-in layout styles of the PopupView.

member.summary: A layout with one button in the footer.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.UWP.PopupLayout.AppearanceMode.TwoButton
member.summary: A layout with two buttons in the footer.
